about.details:
Incorporated in 1998, Misquita Engineering Ltd is a manufacturer and supplier of front-loading washers. The company supplies and does job-work of the front-loading washers for washing machine makers in India.

The company believes in the zero-defect product which means zero wastage, zero effect and efficient & effective use of resources.

The company qualifies to work as a strategic supplier and supplies machined parts to Commscope USA. Misquita Engineering is planning to expand its building capacity and evolve new technologies to improve the process control level and automation system.

The company can maintain a tolerance band of ten microns (maximum) with 5 CNC turning centres and some supporting conventional machines.

Competitive Strengths

  • Growing Indian economy
  • Quality assurance & standards
  • A strong relationship with suppliers
  • Fully integrated manufacturing unit

faqs.question: What is the Misquita IPO?
faqs.answer:
Misquita IPO is a SME IPO of 716000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹1.93 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹27 per share. The minimum order quantity is 4000.

The IPO opens on September 23, 2019, and closes on September 25, 2019.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Misquita IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Misquita IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Misquita IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Misquita IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Misquita IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Misquita IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Misquita IPO opens on September 23, 2019 and closes on September 25, 2019.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Misquita IPO?
faqs.answer: Misquita IPO lot size is 4000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,08,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Misquita IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Misquita IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Misquita IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Misquita IPO will be done on Monday, September 30, 2019, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, October 1, 2019. Check the Misquita IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Misquita IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Misquita IPO listing date is on Friday, October 4, 2019.
